paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 110 females and 90 males from the Zhuang population
patients.phenotype: Pharmacogenomic variants related to drug response

functional_data.summary: Functional analysis performed using online tools indicated potential impact on protein function.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on functional predictions.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was significantly different in genotype frequency compared to other populations.
key_quotes: The Zhuang population exhibited significant differences in rs1805123 (KCNH2) compared to 26 other populations.

tables_processed.table_caption: Basic information of 48 selected VIP variants in the Zhuang population.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
